steps.title: Initial Consultation
details: Free In-Home Assessment - Measure space and assess current systems
Design Discussion - Your vision, needs, and preferences
System Evaluation - Current system capacity and upgrade needs
Budget Planning - Investment levels and financing options

steps.title: Design Development
details: Space Planning - Optimal layout for functionality
Fixture Selection - Coordinate with your style preferences
Installation Planning - Lighting, outlets, and special features
Material Coordination - Tiles, finishes, and colors

steps.title: Permit Applications
details: Building Permits - Required for structural changes
Installation Permits - All installation work properly permitted
Plumbing Permits - If relocating fixtures
Inspection Scheduling - Coordinate all required inspections

steps.title: Project Preparation
details: Material Ordering - All fixtures, tiles, and installation components
Site Protection - Protect surrounding areas during construction
Utility Coordination - Temporary service arrangements
Timeline Confirmation - Final schedule and milestone dates

steps.title: Demolition Work
details: Safe Removal - Careful demolition to protect structure
System Disconnection - Safe shutdown of existing systems
Plumbing Removal - Proper capping and protection
Debris Removal - Clean and organized work site

steps.title: Rough-In Installation
details: System Rough-In - New circuits, outlets, and lighting
Plumbing Rough-In - New supply and drain lines
Structural Work - Any framing or structural modifications
Inspection Scheduling - Rough-in inspections

steps.title: Surface Installation
details: Tile Installation - Floors, walls, and shower areas
System Finishing - Outlets, switches, and fixtures
Plumbing Fixtures - Toilets, vanities, shower systems
Painting & Trim - Final finishes and detail work

steps.title: Final Details
details: Fixture Installation - Mirrors, towel bars, accessories
System Testing - All systems tested and verified
Final Cleanup - Complete cleaning and debris removal
Final Inspection - All permits closed and approved

sections.headline: Why Choose Top Notch for Your Bathroom Remodel

benefits: Direct Service - Pedro handles all project management personally
Cost Efficiency - Direct supplier relationships for better pricing
Quality Control - Single-source accountability for entire project
Code Compliance - Expert knowledge of current building codes
Community Reputation - Established local business since 2018
Quick Response - Based in Linden, serving surrounding counties
Local Permits - Familiar with all municipal requirements
Ongoing Support - Available for future service and maintenance
Design to Completion - Full-service bathroom renovations
Quality Materials - Partnerships with trusted suppliers
Professional Installation - Skilled craftsmanship on every project
Warranty Protection - Comprehensive warranties on all work

testimonials.quote: Pedro completely transformed our master bathroom. His attention to detail and professional craftsmanship were invaluable - he installed heated floors, smart lighting, and a ventilation system that actually works. The project was completed on time and the quality is outstanding.

We needed our bathroom to be ADA compliant for my mother. Pedro not only handled the renovation beautifully but also ensured all the installation work met safety requirements. His attention to detail is impressive.
The spa bathroom of our dreams! Pedro's professional installation made all the difference - from the mood lighting to the heated towel racks. You can tell he takes pride in his craftsmanship.
